thread.title: Win the ultimate A-List package
thread.title_full: Win the ultimate A-List package - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win the ultimate A-List package
text: Madame Tussauds London features over 300 incredibly lifelike wax figures from Hollywood to Bollywood, Royalty to World Leaders, Musical Icons to Sports Star. Plus, created in close collaboration with Disney and Lucasfilm visit the all new Star Wars Experience; a unique, immersive experience starring extraordinarily life-like wax figures of the favourite heroes and villains of Star Wars Episodes I-VI. Gracefully rotating over the River Thames opposite the Houses of Parliament and Big Ben, the Coca-Cola London Eye, at 135 metres, is the world’s tallest cantilevered observation wheel, offering breath-taking 360 degree views of the capital and its famous landmarks – and there is no better way to experience the beauty of London in your own private capsule with champagne. Competition ends on Monday, 30 November 2015 Terms and Conditions Online Form - Win the ultimate A-List package telegraph.co.uk
